abstract: A Google founder said the shift of its Chinese service to Hong Kong was not given a clear-cut stamp of approval by Beijing.
snippet: A Google founder said the shift of its Chinese service to Hong Kong was not given a clear-cut stamp of approval by Beijing.
lead_paragraph: 6:08 p.m. | Updated  Adding more excerpts from interview.

headline.main: Interview: Sergey Brin on Google’s China Move
